title: Erectile Dysfunction (ED)
description: Erectile dysfunction is one of the major symptoms of diabetes. According to many studies, almost 50% of males with diabetes face ED. It is a condition in which a man cannot attain an erection. In the absence of other health issues like kidney problems, high blood pressure, stress, or nerve problems, diabetes can be the sole factor to it.

title: Urological Condition
description: Diabetes or high blood sugar levels can increase the risk of various urological conditions like UTI (urinary tract infections), urine leakage, hyperactive bladder, etc. If these symptoms appear, go for a blood glucose level test.

title: Damaged Autonomic Nervous System
description: High glucose levels in the body constrict blood vessels that damage nerve cells and restrict smooth blood circulation. It impacts penis nerves and blood flow hence causing ED.
